welcome_message_body: Welcome to Halton Hills, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside, historic charm, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful community and enjoy all that it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
